summary: DOOR LATCH FALSE SENSOR. CAR DOES NOT PROPERLY REGISTER MY PASSENGER DOOR AS CLOSED. AS A RESULT, MY AUTOMATIC LOCK SYSTEM DOES NOT WORK AND I START OUT DRIVING WITH MY INSIDE LIGHTS ON. SAFETY CONCERN GIVEN HAT I LIVE IN THE CITY. ALSO, THIS ISSUE HAS CAUSED MY PARKED CAR ALARM TO FALSELY GO OFF AND DRAINED MY BATTERY. I HAD TO PAY $300 FOR A NEW BATTERY WHEN THE CAUSE IS A MANUFACTURER ERROR THAT I'VE COMPLAINED ABOUT FOR OVER A YEAR AND HAVE NOW BEEN ADVISED THAT I MUST PAY OVER $300 TO REPAIR.
